chú thích báo.{{chú thích báo |first: DONALD |last=MORRISON |title=Ghost Dad (bk rvw of AS I SAW IT by Dean Rusk, as told to Richard Rusk) |url=http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,970754,00.html |work=[[Time (magazine)|Time]] |date=ngày 30 tháng 7 năm 1990 |access-date=ngày 4 tháng 2 năm 2008 |quote="I won't be around for history's verdict," says Rusk, now 81 and ailing in his Georgia retirement, "and I am perfectly relaxed about it." |archive-date=2008-12-15 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20081215155027/http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,970754,00.html }}
